title: Kaatru Veliyidai: Aditi Rao Hydari looks smashing hot in this Mani Ratnam film | regional movies | Hindustan Times
text:
Kaatru Veliyidai: Aditi Rao Hydari looks smashing hot in this Mani Ratnam film regional movies Updated: Feb 02, 2017 12:02 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Kaatru Veliyidai is a love story between Karti and Aditi. 
Aditi Rao Hydari has a reason to smile. In fact, she’s got two. First she is the leading lady in a Mani Ratnam film, Kaatru Veliyidai, and then, she’s the killing it on the internet for her ravishing look in a song, composed by music maestro AR Rahman. Titled Azhagiye, the video also features Karti. 
The one minute-long song shows the cinematic talent of its DoP Ravi Barman and the magical love-laden world of Mani Ratnam. Read more
